body: I mean like okay it's okay if they put things like chastity belts on h-mangas but that shit is fucking cringe when you realize they got that shit on for five straight days locked with no way to piss and poop. Anyways Shingeki brings me enough entertainment value.

it's that time of the month again (　･ิω･ิ) 
, btw i recommend aoyama kiiro. his/her art is splendid
